page.title: 18POP MUSIC
page.content: A survey of sixteen year old boys and girls revealed the following about todays music: Girls:-All my friends like the following groups;Wham,Madonna,and Ah-Ah because they are young people who wear bright trendy clothes that we would all like to be able to wear. There music is good and very easy to listen to and you can hear the words they are singing which is a change from some of the groups that are on the radio and television today. Boys:-A lot of the boys in my year prefer to listen to 'Heavy Metal' groups such as Status Quo,AC/DC and Real Life. They play their music very fast and loud which makes it much more exciting than other groups. However the words of their songs are not as important as the music itself.
